tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeTraining (
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  certification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  certification_date DATE NOT NULL,
  certification_valid_until DATE NOT NULL,
  compliance_requirement VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  position VARCHAR(100),
  certification VARCHAR(100),
  certification_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE training_courses (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(100),
  instructor VARCHAR(100),
  duration_hours INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_requirements (
  requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE training (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    training_name VARCHAR(50),
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    trainer VARCHAR(50),
    training_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_certifications (
    employee_id INT,
    certification_id INT,
    certification_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, certification_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees (employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications (certification_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Employees (  employee_id INT,  employee_name VARCHAR(50),  hire_date DATE,  certification_id INT,  PRIMARY KEY (employee_id) );
CREATE TABLE Certifications (  certification_id INT,  certification_name VARCHAR(50),  expiration_date DATE,  PRIMARY KEY (certification_id) );
CREATE TABLE TrainingPrograms (  program_id INT,  program_name VARCHAR(50),  program_description TEXT,  PRIMARY KEY (program_id) );

CREATE TABLE EmployeeCertifications (  employee_id INT,  certification_id INT,  issue_date DATE,  expiration_date DATE,  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),  FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES Certifications(certification_id) );

CREATE TABLE EmployeeTraining (  employee_id INT,  program_id INT,  training_date DATE,  completion_status BOOLEAN,  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES TrainingPrograms(program_id) );
